add_library(cmsis-nn STATIC
    Source/ActivationFunctions/arm_nn_activations_q7.c
    Source/ActivationFunctions/arm_nn_activations_q15.c
    Source/ActivationFunctions/arm_relu_q7.c
    Source/ActivationFunctions/arm_relu_q15.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_convolve_1x1_HWC_q7_fast_nonsquare.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_convolve_HWC_q7_basic.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_convolve_HWC_q7_basic_nonsquare.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_convolve_HWC_q7_fast.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_convolve_HWC_q7_fast_nonsquare.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_convolve_HWC_q7_RGB.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_convolve_HWC_q15_basic.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_convolve_HWC_q15_fast.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_convolve_HWC_q15_fast_nonsquare.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_depthwise_separable_conv_HWC_q7.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_depthwise_separable_conv_HWC_q7_nonsquare.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_nn_mat_mult_kernel_q7_q15.c
    Source/ConvolutionFunctions/arm_nn_mat_mult_kernel_q7_q15_reordered.c
    Source/FullyConnectedFunctions/arm_fully_connected_q7.c
    Source/FullyConnectedFunctions/arm_fully_connected_q7_opt.c
    Source/FullyConnectedFunctions/arm_fully_connected_mat_q7_vec_q15.c
    Source/FullyConnectedFunctions/arm_fully_connected_mat_q7_vec_q15_opt.c
    Source/FullyConnectedFunctions/arm_fully_connected_q15.c
    Source/FullyConnectedFunctions/arm_fully_connected_q15_opt.c
    Source/NNSupportFunctions/arm_nn_mult_q7.c
    Source/NNSupportFunctions/arm_nn_mult_q15.c
    Source/NNSupportFunctions/arm_nntables.c
    Source/NNSupportFunctions/arm_q7_to_q15_no_shift.c
    Source/NNSupportFunctions/arm_q7_to_q15_reordered_no_shift.c
    Source/PoolingFunctions/arm_pool_q7_HWC.c
    Source/SoftmaxFunctions/arm_softmax_q7.c
    Source/SoftmaxFunctions/arm_softmax_q15.c
)

target_include_directories(cmsis-nn
    PUBLIC
        Include
)

target_link_libraries(cmsis-nn
    PUBLIC
        cmsis-dsp
)
